attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was 'caught' by one of these toys last year on the A303. The website shows a police van clearly in view in the middle of a bridge. The picture of my car shows that it was taken at angle, meaning that the police were skulking in the bushes at the side of the bridge. Internet research shows that an angled shot is more likely to be inaccurate. They said I was doing 88, but my passenger, cruise control and Road Angel say different. Then they blackmailed me by saying that if I didn't accept £60 and three points and went to court it might be £1,000 and more points. The Government and the police are no better then the Robber Barons of old.

reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
